Sentencas: Application of input-output linearization control for improving the dynamic response of a stand-alone solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system is presented in this work.
Titulo: Input-Output Linearization-Based Controller Design for Stand-Alone Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Plant

Sentencas: The proposed controllers are incorporated in the study system to eliminate the sluggishness in the hydrogen and oxygen partial pressure responses due to variations in the SOFC reference current.
Titulo: Input-Output Linearization-Based Controller Design for Stand-Alone Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Plant

Sentencas: Temperature dynamics of SOFC is taken into consideration to replicate the impact of temperature variation on the system dynamics.
Titulo: Input-Output Linearization-Based Controller Design for Stand-Alone Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Plant

Sentencas: Eigenvalue study of the linearized zero dynamics is conducted to determine the stability of the unobservable part of the system, and the remaining dynamics is considered for designing the input-output linearization-based controllers.
Titulo: Input-Output Linearization-Based Controller Design for Stand-Alone Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Plant

Sentencas: Pole placement technique is adopted to obtain the controller gains which give the desired dynamic response.
Titulo: Input-Output Linearization-Based Controller Design for Stand-Alone Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Plant

Sentencas: The performance of the proposed technique is compared with that of the optimized proportional-integral (PI) controller.
Titulo: Input-Output Linearization-Based Controller Design for Stand-Alone Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Plant

Sentencas: The proposed controller efficiency is also tested under varying operating conditions and measurement noise.
Titulo: Input-Output Linearization-Based Controller Design for Stand-Alone Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Plant

Sentencas: Simulation results show the efficacy and supremacy of the proposed method in improving the dynamic response of the study system.
Titulo: Input-Output Linearization-Based Controller Design for Stand-Alone Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Plant
